Advanced data
NPC ID7716

Gadrin is one of the three dwarves who guard the Mining Guild in the south-eastern area of Falador, next to the ladders that lead into the guild. He sells the Mining cape and hood to those who have achieved 99 Mining.

Contents

  • 1 Stock
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has multiple 99s, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

ItemPrice
sold at
Mining cape 99,000

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 June 2017
(update)

Dwarf's name was changed to Gadrin, he became the only NPC to sell the mining cape.
